DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Systemic Mindfulness-based Intervention Program Cystic Fibrosis Clinic
DOC.detailed_description: The study active interventional program approximately six month duration . All participant initially undergo initial assessment interview . Personnel train certified mindfulness-based stress reduction ( MBSR ) run mindfulness-based group 6-8 weekly 1 1/2 hour session ( staff group comprise 6 session parent ' patient ' group 8 session long ) . Participants learn engage various formal informal meditation practice experiential learn skill , include concentration , mindfulness thought , emotion , feeling bodily sensation , decentering , let go . Each group include practical exercise psycho-educational component . Daily homework , essential aspect course , include meditation practice together exercise design integrate application awareness skill daily life . On day 0 , participant complete battery questionnaires well test physical status CF disease . This battery repeat 8 week , 6 month .
